title: List data policies
description: Lists all data policies in a specified project.

objective.narrative: Developers often need to programmatically review all the data governance rules applied to their BigQuery data. This sample provides the code to fetch a complete list of data policies, which can then be used for automated reporting, compliance checks, or bulk management tasks.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2_datapolicyservice_datapolicies_list
regionTags.title: List data policies
regionTags.description: Lists all data policies in a specified project.
